originalText.text: I love Taco Hut, nice thing about it is you don't have to eat Tacos lol they have a Asian menu and American menu items like hot wings, fries, onion rings, cheese fries, Mexican drinks, quesidillas, freshly made tortillas daily, nacho platters, shrimp, steak, chicken, ground beef, fish Avocado salad, large portions 2 can eat for one unless you just being greedy lol inexpensive. Try it your gonna like it.

text.text: I love Taco Hut, nice thing about it is you don't have to eat Tacos lol they have a Asian menu and American menu items like hot wings, fries, onion rings, cheese fries, Mexican drinks, quesidillas, freshly made tortillas daily, nacho platters, shrimp, steak, chicken, ground beef, fish Avocado salad, large portions 2 can eat for one unless you just being greedy lol inexpensive. Try it your gonna like it.

originalText.text: I live across the street from taco hut , I order to pick up often usually I order a Mexican rice or wings but today I decided to try something new. unfortunately I was very disappointed my burrito was not rolled the ingredients were stuffed inside like a taco. Also to meat ( steak ) was very dry and burnt. I’m a big fan of Mexican cuisine and I could tell the burrito hadn’t be prepared properly or was expired. Im very disappointed that this happen to me since I’ve been bragging about location since it opened. I tip every time  because I know that they are a new business to the neighborhood.But today I felt like I was given scraps of the kitchen. Please if you do not know how to make Mexican cuisines please do not get into the business for money this was very disappointing being that I have A child and traveled in the cold to pick up the order to get home and not be satisfied.

originalText.text: This is an Asian takeout place. There was no one there when I walked in and they were quick with my order. However the same lady took my money and prepares my food, without washing her hands. Cleanliness is a big deal for me. I ordered hot wings and fries. The wings were not spicy at all, or even flavorful. Someone close by recommend it and I don't see what they like about it. I wouldn't return there. I'd just go to a regular chinese/asain takeout place if I want Asain food, and somewhere else for comfort food.

originalText.text:
Update: I spend my money here a lot, and last week I went in to order a dish, and the order came out to 8 dollars and 25 cents. I was short 25 cents so the lady behind the counter had a little attitude and, at first, didn't want to put my order in. Then she changed her mind and said next time, bring a quarter. SMH Really!!!!! She acts like I offered her five dollars. I spend a lot of money at this restaurant, and the one day I'm short a quarter, I get an attitude. I will not get mistreated at any restaurant or establishment where the owners make money in the neighborhood but don't invest it back into the neighborhood. Make their money and take it to their neighborhood and homes.

Taco Hut serves Mexican, Asian, and American food. I ordered the shrimp lo mein and it was good. I will try something new on my next visit

originalText.text: I didn’t realize at first but I waited 30 minutes for my food , it was my third time there. I spent my break waiting . Everyone who ordered their food after me got their food before me .I understand there’s only the lady at the register and a man in the back . She handle money she cook and also prep. I ordered chicken wings and she gave my chicken wings to other customers I told her that wasn’t right she laughed then said just wait .Horrible place , they just care about the money . The food is a hit or miss .
